text: Top Programming Languages for AI Engineers in 2020
translation: 2020年AI工程师的顶级编程语言

text: From several programming languages, AI engineers and scientists can pick the right one that suits the needs of their project
translation: AI工程师和科学家可以从几种编程语言中选择适合其项目需求的正确语言

text: Artificial Intelligence has now become an integral part of our daily lives with all the benefits it provides over hundreds of unique use cases and situations, not to mention how simple and easy it has made things for us.
translation: 人工智能凭借其为数百种独特用例和情况提供的所有好处，已成为我们日常生活中不可或缺的一部分，更不用说它为我们带来了多么简单。

text: With the boost in recent years, AI has come a long way to help businesses grow and achieve their full potential. These advancements in AI would not have been possible without the core improvements in the underlying programming languages.
translation: 随着近年来的增长，人工智能在帮助企业发展和实现其全部潜力方面已经走了很长的路要走。 没有底层编程语言的核心改进，人工智能的这些进步是不可能的。

text: With the boom in AI, the need for efficient and skilled programmers and engineers skyrocketed along with improvements in programming languages. While there are plenty of programming languages to get you started with developing on AI, no single programming language is a one-stop-solution for AI programming as various objectives require a specific approach for every project.
translation: 随着AI的蓬勃发展，对高效，熟练的程序员和工程师的需求随着编程语言的改进而激增。 尽管有很多编程语言可以帮助您开始进行AI开发，但是没有一种编程语言是AI编程的一站式解决方案，因为各种目标都需要针对每个项目的特定方法。

text: We will discuss some of the most popular ones listed below and leave the decision making up to you —
translation: 我们将讨论下面列出的一些最受欢迎的方法，然后由您自己决定？

text: ● Python
translation: ●Python

text: Python is the most powerful language you can still read.- Pau Dubois
translation: Python是您仍然可以阅读的最强大的语言。-Pau Dubois

text: Developed in 1991, Python has been A poll that suggests over 57% of developers are more likely to pick Python over C++ as their programming language of choice for developing AI solutions. Being easy-to-learn, Python offers an easier entry into the world of AI development for programmers and data scientists alike.
translation: Python于1991年开发，是一项民意测验，表明超过57％的开发人员更有可能选择Python而不是C ++作为开发AI解决方案的首选编程语言。 Python易于学习，为程序员和数据科学家提供了更轻松的进入AI开发领域的机会。

text: Python is an experiment in how much freedom programmers need. Too much freedom and nobody can read another’s code; too little and expressiveness is endangered.
translation: Python是程序员需要多少自由度的实验。 太多的自由，没有人可以阅读别人的密码； 太少，表现力受到威胁。

text: - Guido van Rossum
translation: -Guido van Rossum

text: With Python, you not only get excellent community support and an extensive set of libraries but also enjoy the flexibility provided by the programming language. Some of the features that you may benefit the most from Python are platform independence and extensive frameworks for Deep Learning and Machine Learning.
translation: 使用Python，您不仅可以获得出色的社区支持和广泛的库集，还可以享受编程语言提供的灵活性。 您可能会从Python中受益最多的一些功能是平台独立性以及用于深度学习和机器学习的广泛框架。

text: The joy of coding Python should be in seeing short, concise, readable classes that express a lot of action in a small amount of clear code — not in reams of trivial code that bores the reader to death.
translation: 使用Python进行编码的乐趣应该在于看到简短，简洁，易读的类，这些类以少量清晰的代码表达很多动作，而不是使大量琐碎的代码烦死读者。

text: - Guido van Rossum
translation: -Guido van Rossum

text: Python Code Snippet Example:
translation: Python代码段示例：

text: Some of its most popular libraries are -
translation: 它最受欢迎的一些图书馆是-

text: ● TensorFlow, for machine learning workloads and working with datasets
translation: ●TensorFlow，用于机器学习工作负载和数据集

text: ● scikit-learn, for training machine learning models
translation: ●scikit-learn，用于训练机器学习模型

text: ● PyTorch, for computer vision and natural language processing
translation: ●PyTorch，用于计算机视觉和自然语言处理

text: ● Keras, as the code interface for highly complex mathematical calculations and operations
translation: ●Keras，作为高度复杂的数学计算和运算的代码接口

text: ● SparkMLlib, like Apache Spark’s Machine Learning library, making machine learning easy for everyone with tools like algorithms and utilities
translation: ●Spark MLlib（类似于Apache Spark机器学习库），通过算法和实用程序等工具使所有人轻松进行机器学习

text: ● MXNet, as another one of Apache’s library for easing deep learning workflows
translation: ●MXNet，这是Apache的另一个库，用于简化深度学习工作流程

text: ● Theano, as the library for defining, optimizing and evaluating mathematical expressions
translation: ●Theano，作为定义，优化和评估数学表达式的库

text: ● Pybrain, for powerful machine learning algorithms
translation: ●Pybrain，用于强大的机器学习算法

text: Also, Python has surpassed Java and became the 2nd most popular language according to GitHub repositories contributions. In fact, Stack Overflow calls it the “fastest growing” major programming language.”
translation: 而且，根据GitHub存储库的贡献，Python已超越Java，成为第二大最受欢迎的语言。 实际上，Stack Overflow称之为“增长最快”的主要编程语言。”

text: Python Courses for Beginners —
translation: 初学者的Python课程-

text: 3 Free Python Courses For Beginners: 2020 Edition
translation: 3道面向初学者的免费Python课程：2020版

text: If you are looking for the best Free Python courses that you can use to expand your Python knowledge, you have come to…
translation: 如果您正在寻找可用于扩展Python知识的最佳Free Python课程，那么您来……

text: Python Bootcamps: Learn Python Programming and Code Training
translation: Python训练营：学习Python编程和代码培训

text: This is the most comprehensive, yet straight-forward, course for the Python programming language on Udemy! Whether you…
translation: 这是Udemy上关于Python编程语言的最全面，最直接的课程！ 无论你…

text: ● Java
translation: ●Java

text: Write once, run anywhere
translation: 编写一次，可在任何地方运行

text: Java is considered one of the best programming languages in the world and the last 20 years of its use is proof of that.
translation: Java被认为是世界上最好的编程语言之一，其使用的最近20年就是证明。

text: With its high user-friendliness, flexible nature and platform independence, Java has been used for developing for AI in various ways, read on to know about some of them:
translation: 凭借其高度的用户友好性，灵活的特性和平台独立性，Java已经以各种方式用于AI的开发，请继续阅读以了解其中的一些信息：

text: ● TensorFlowTensorFlow’s list of supported programming languages also includes Java with an API. The support isn’t as feature-rich as other fully supported languages, but it’s there and is being improved at a rapid pace.
translation: ●TensorFlowTensorFlow的受支持编程语言列表还包括带有API的Java。 该支持不像其他完全支持的语言那样功能丰富，但是已经存在并且正在迅速得到改善。

text: ● Deep Java Library Built by Amazon to create and deploy deep learning abilities using Java.
translation: ●亚马逊建立的深度Java库，用于使用Java创建和部署深度学习功能。

text: ● KubeflowKubeflow facilitates easy deployment and management of Machine Learning stacks on Kubernetes, providing ready to use ML solutions.
translation: ●KubeflowKubeflow有助于在Kubernetes上轻松部署和管理机器学习堆栈，从而提供即用型ML解决方案。

text: ● OpenNLP Apache’s OpenNLP is a machine learning tool for natural language processing.
translation: ●OpenNLP Apache的OpenNLP是用于自然语言处理的机器学习工具。

text: ● Java Machine Learning Library Java-ML provides developers with several machine learning algorithms.
translation: ●Java机器学习库Java-ML为开发人员提供了几种机器学习算法。

text: ● Neuroph Neuroph makes designing neural networks using the open-source framework of Java possible with the help of Neuroph GUI.
translation: ●Neuroph Neuroph借助Neuroph GUI，可以使用Java的开源框架设计神经网络。

text: If Java had true garbage collection, most programs would delete themselves upon execution.- Robert Sewell
translation: 如果Java拥有真正的垃圾回收器，大多数程序将在执行时将其删除。-Robert Sewell

text: Java Code Snippet Example:
translation: Java代码段示例：

text: Java Courses for Beginners —
translation: 初学者Java课程-

text: Top 5 Java Programming Courses for Beginners to Learn Online - Best of Lot
translation: 面向在线初学者的5大Java编程课程-最佳地段

text: If you are a computer science graduate or someone who wants to learn Java and looking for some awesome resources e.g…
translation: 如果您是计算机科学专业的毕业生，或者想学习Java并寻找一些很棒的资源的人，例如……

text: ● R
translation: ●R

text: R was created by Ross Ihaka and Robert Gentleman with the first version being launched in 1995. Currently being maintained by the R Development Core Team, R is the implementation of S programming language and aids in developing statistical software and data analysis.
translation: R由Ross Ihaka和Robert Gentleman创建，第一个版本于1995年发布。R由R Development Core团队维护，R是S编程语言的实现，有助于开发统计软件和数据分析。

text: The qualities that are making R a good fit for AI programming among developers are:
translation: 使R非常适合开发人员中的AI编程的素质是：

text: ● The fundamental feature of R being good at crunching huge numbers puts it in a better position than Python with its comparatively unrefined NumPy package.
translation: ●R善于处理大量数据的基本特征使其相对Python而言具有相对完善的NumPy软件包，因此比Python处于更好的位置。

text: ● With R, you can work on various paradigms of programming such as functional programming, vectorial computation and object-oriented programming.
translation: ●使用R，可以处理各种编程范例，例如功能编程，矢量计算和面向对象的编程。

text: Some of the AI programming packages available for R are:
translation: 可用于R的一些AI编程软件包是：

text: ● Gmodels provides a collection of several tools for model fitting
translation: ●Gmodels提供了多种工具进行模型拟合

text: ● Tm, as a framework for text mining applications  ● RODBC as an ODBC interface for R
translation: ●Tm，作为文本挖掘应用程序的框架●RODBC作为R的ODBC接口

text: ● OneR, for implementing One Rule Machine Learning classification algorithm, useful for machine learning models
translation: ●OneR，用于实现“单规则机器学习”分类算法，对机器学习模型很有用

text: Used widely among Data Miners and Statisticians, features provided by R are:
translation: R提供的功能在数据挖掘者和统计学家中广泛使用，它们是：

text: ● Wide variety of libraries and packages to extend its functionalities
translation: ●各种各样的库和软件包以扩展其功能

text: ● Active and supportive community
translation: ●积极支持社区

text: ● Able to work in tandem with C, C++ and Fortran
translation: ●能够与C，C ++和Fortran协同工作

text: ● Several packages help extend the functionalities
translation: ●多个软件包有助于扩展功能

text: ● Support for producing high-quality graphs
translation: ●支持生成高质量图形

text: Something Interesting —Covid-19 Interactive Map made using R
translation: 有趣的东西-使用R制作的Covid-19交互式地图

text: ● Prolog
translation: ●序言

text: Short for Logic Programming, Prolog first showed up in 1972. It makes for an exciting tool for developing Artificial Intelligence, specifically Natural Language Processing. Prolog works best for creating chatbots, ELIZA was the first-ever chatbot created with Prolog to have ever existed.
translation: 逻辑编程的缩写，Prolog于1972年首次出现。它为开发人工智能（特别是自然语言处理）提供了令人兴奋的工具。 Prolog最适合创建聊天机器人，ELIZA是有史以来第一个使用Prolog创建的聊天机器人。

text: To understand Prolog, you must familiarize yourself with some of the fundamental terms of Prolog’s that guide it’s working, they are explained in brief below:
translation: 要了解Prolog，您必须熟悉Prolog指导其工作的一些基本术语，以下简要说明：

text: ● Facts define the true statements
translation: ●事实确定了真实的陈述

text: ● Rules define the statement but with additional conditions
translation: ●规则定义了语句，但有附加条件

text: ● Goals define where the submitted statements stand according to the knowledgebase
translation: ●目标根据知识库定义提交的语句的位置

text: ● Queries define the how of making your statement true and the final analysis of facts and rules
translation: ●查询定义如何使您的陈述正确，以及对事实和规则的最终分析

text: Prolog offers two approaches for implementing AI that has been in practice for a long time and is well-known among data scientists and researchers:
translation: Prolog提供了两种实施AI的方法，这种方法已经存在了很长时间，并且在数据科学家和研究人员中广为人知：

text: ● The Symbolic Approach includes rule-based expert systems, theorem provers, constraint-based approaches.
translation: ●符号方法包括基于规则的专家系统，定理证明，基于约束的方法。

text: ● The Statistical approach includes neural nets, data mining, machine learning and several others.
translation: ●统计方法包括神经网络，数据挖掘，机器学习等。

text: ●Lisp
translation: ●Lisp

caption: Lisp code to create an n-inputs m-units one layer perceptron(source)

text: Short for List Processing, it is the second oldest programming language next to Fortran. Called as one of the Founding Fathers of AI, Lisp was created by John McCarthy in 1958.
translation: 列表处理的简称，它是仅次于Fortran的第二古老编程语言。 Lisp被称为AI的奠基人之一，由John McCarthy于1958年创建。

text: Lisp is a language for doing what you’ve been told is impossible.
translation: Lisp是一种用来告诉您不可能完成的事情的语言。

text: -Kent Pitman
translation: 肯特·皮特曼

text: Built as a practical mathematical notation for programs, Lisp soon became the choice of AI programming language for developers very quickly. Below are some of the Lisp features that make it one of the best options for AI projects on Machine Learning:
translation: Lisp是作为程序的实用数学符号构建的，很快就成为开发人员AI编程语言的快速选择。 以下是一些Lisp功能，使其成为机器学习AI项目的最佳选择之一：

text: ● Rapid Prototyping
translation: ●快速原型制作

text: ● Dynamic Object Creation
translation: ●动态对象创建

text: ● Garbage Collection
translation: ●垃圾回收

text: ● Flexibility
translation: ●灵活性

text: With major improvements in other competing programming languages, several features specific to Lisp have made their way into other languages. Some of the notable projects that involved Lisp at some point in time are Reddit and HackerNews.
translation: 随着其他竞争性编程语言的重大改进，Lisp特有的一些功能已进入其他语言。 在某些时候涉及Lisp的一些著名项目是Reddit和HackerNews。

text: Take Lisp, you know its the most beautiful language in the world — at least up until Haskell came along.-Larry Wall
translation: 以Lisp为例，您知道它是世界上最美丽的语言-至少直到Haskell出现为止。-Larry Wall

text: ● Haskell
translation: ●哈斯克尔

text: Defined in 1990 and named after the famous mathematician Haskell Brooks Curry, Haskell is a purely functional and statically typed programming language, paired with lazy evaluation and shorter code.
translation: Haskell于1990年定义，以著名的数学家Haskell Brooks Curry命名，是一种纯粹的功能性和静态类型化的编程语言，与惰性评估和较短的代码配对。

text: It is considered a very safe programming language as it tends to offer more flexibility in terms of handling errors as they happen so rarely in Haskell compared to other programming languages. Even if they do occur, a majority of the non-syntactical errors are caught at compile-time instead of runtime. Some of the features offered by Haskell are:
translation: 它被认为是一种非常安全的编程语言，因为它在处理错误方面趋于提供更大的灵活性，因为与其他编程语言相比，在Haskell中很少发生错误。 即使确实发生了，大多数非语法错误也会在编译时而不是运行时捕获。 Haskell提供的一些功能包括：

text: ● Strong abstraction capabilities
translation: ●强大的抽象能力

text: ● Built-in memory management
translation: ●内置内存管理

text: ● Code reusability
translation: ●代码可重用性

text: ● Easy to understand
translation: ●易于理解

text: SQL, Lisp , and Haskell are the only programming languages that I’ve seen where one spends more time thinking than typing.-Philip Greenspun
translation: SQL，Lisp和Haskell是我所见过的惟一一种编程语言，人们在这些语言上花费的时间比输入更多。-Philip Greenspun

text: Its features help improve the productivity of the programmer. Haskell is a lot like the other programming languages, just used by a niche group of developers. Putting the challenges aside, Haskell can prove to be just as good as other competing languages for AI with increased adoption by the developer community.
translation: 它的功能有助于提高程序员的生产率。 Haskell与其他编程语言非常相似，只是由一小部分开发人员使用。 撇开挑战，随着开发人员社区的广泛采用，Haskell可以证明与其他竞争性AI语言一样出色。

text: ● Julia
translation: ●朱莉娅

text: Julia is a high-performance and general-purpose dynamic programming language tailored to create almost any application but is highly suited for numerical analysis and computational science. Various tools available for working with Julia are:
translation: Julia是一种高性能通用通用动态编程语言，旨在创建几乎所有应用程序，但高度适合于数值分析和计算科学。 与Julia一起使用的各种工具包括：

text: ● Popular editors such as Vim and Emacs
translation: ●流行的编辑器，例如Vim和Emacs

text: ● IDEs such as Juno and Visual Studio
translation: ●IDE，例如Juno和Visual Studio

text: Some of the several features offered by Julia that make it a noteworthy option for AI programming, Machine Learning, statistics, and data modeling are:
translation: Julia提供的一些功能使其成为AI编程，机器学习，统计和数据建模的重要选择，其中包括：

text: ● Dynamic type system
translation: ●动态类型系统

text: ● Built-in package manager
translation: ●内置包管理器

text: ● Able to work for parallel and distributed computing
translation: ●能够进行并行和分布式计算

text: ● Macros and metaprogramming abilities
translation: ●宏和元编程能力

text: ● Support for Multiple dispatches
translation: ●支持多种调度

text: ● Direct support for C functions
translation: ●直接支持C函数

text: Built to eliminate the weaknesses of other programming languages, Julia can also be used for Machine Learning applications with integrations with tools such as TensorFlow.jl, MLBase.jl, MXNet.jl and many more that utilize the scalability provided by Julia.
translation: 通过消除其他编程语言的弱点，Julia还可以用于机器学习应用程序，并与TensorFlow.jl，MLBase.jl，MXNet.jl等工具集成在一起，并且可以利用Julia提供的可伸缩性进行更多开发。

text: Google Trend — Julia Interest Over Time
translation: Google趋势-朱莉娅（Julia）

text: JuliaCon 2019 Highlights —
translation: JuliaCon 2019亮点—

text: Conclusion
translation: 结论

text: With several AI programming languages to choose from, AI engineers and scientists can pick the right one that suits the needs of their project. Every AI programming language comes with its fair share of pros and cons. With improvements made to these languages regularly, it won’t be long when developing for AI would become more comfortable than how it is today so that more people could join this wave of innovation. Outstanding community support has made things even better for new people, and the community contributions towards several packages and extensions make life easier for everyone.
translation: 通过选择多种AI编程语言，AI工程师和科学家可以选择适合其项目需求的正确语言。 每种AI编程语言都有其各自的优缺点。 通过定期对这些语言进行改进，很快就可以为AI的开发带来比今天更加舒适的体验，从而使更多的人可以加入这一创新浪潮。 出色的社区支持使新人们的处境变得更加美好，社区对多个软件包和扩展的贡献使每个人的生活变得更加轻松。

text: (本文翻译自Claire D.的文章《Top Programming Languages for AI Engineers in 2020》，参考：https://towardsdatascience.com/top-programming-languages-for-ai-engineers-in-2020-33a9f16a80b0)
translation: （本文翻译自Claire D.
